    • Constructor Detail

      • RDBMSLuceneVertexIndex

        public RDBMSLuceneVertexIndex(String indexName,
                      OraclePropertyGraph oraclePropertyGraph,
                      Parameter<String,Object>[] indexParameters,
                      boolean erase)
        Constructs a new RDBMSLuceneVertexIndex object.
        Parameters:
        indexName - the name of the index
        oraclePropertyGraph - an OraclePropertyGraph object.
        indexParameters - a collection of parameters for the underlying index implementation.
        erase - a boolean specifying if the index should be cleared at the beginning.

    • Method Detail

      • getOracleDirectory

        public OracleDirectory getOracleDirectory()
        Gets the Oracle Directory storing all index data. This directory is obtained based on the configurations specified in the index parameters.
        Overrides:
        getOracleDirectory in class LuceneIndex<Vertex>
        Returns:
        an OracleDirectory object.

      • getOraclePool

        public OraclePool[] getOraclePool(Map<String,Object> indexParams)
        Get the Oracle Pool associated to the specified index parameters
        Returns:
        an OraclePool object.

      • refreshIndex

        public void refreshIndex(long lStartSCN,
                long lEndSCN)
        Auto-refresh an index based on all insert/deletes between the specified start and end SCN.
        Specified by:
        refreshIndex in interface OracleIndex<Vertex>
        Overrides:
        refreshIndex in class LuceneVertexIndex
        Parameters:
        lStartSCN - start SCN value. A NULL value will be treated as MINVALUE to the underlying Oracle Database.
        lEndSCN - end SCN value. A NULL value will be treated as MAXVALUE to the underlying Oracle Database.
